help: ğŸ“– Welcome to the AI Image Bot! Here is a list of commands you can use to get started: Main Features /img - Start generating a new image from a text prompt. /topup - Add more credits to your account using Telegram Stars. Account & Profile /profile - Check your credit balance and daily free credit reset time. /referral - Get your personal referral link to earn bonus credits. Settings /settings - Adjust image settings like aspect ratio and number of outputs. /lang - Change the bot's language..

faq_title:
*Frequently Asked Questions*

Here are some common questions. Please select one to see the answer

If your question isn't listed here, feel free to ask at @botaralabs.
faq_q1_answer: This is an AI-powered bot that can generate images from your text descriptions.
faq_q2_answer: You receive 5 free credits daily. You can also get more by using the `/topup` command or by inviting friends via your `/referral` link.
faq_q3_answer: Each AI model has a different credit cost. You can see the cost next to the model's name when you select one via the `/img` command.
faq_q4_button: Do I lose credits if generation fails?
faq_q4_answer: No, don't worry! If an image generation fails due to an error, your credits will *not* be deducted.
faq_q5_button: Can I use my own image as a reference?
faq_q5_answer: Absolutely! Some models support this feature. It will be indicated when you select a model. Just send your image with your prompt in the *caption*.
faq_q6_button: Why does my image look different from my prompt?
faq_q6_answer:
The quality of the output heavily depends on the detail in your prompt. Try to be more specific and detailed, and use English for best results.

Example:
âŒ `cute cat`
âœ… `a fat orange cat sleeping on a stack of books, 3D cartoon style, soft lighting`
faq_q7_button: How does the credit system work?
faq_q7_answer:
There are 2 types of credits: *Free* & *Paid*.

*Free Credits*: You get 5 of these *every day*. They reset at midnight (00:00 UTC). Any unused free credits from the previous day will expire.

*Paid Credits*: These are the credits you purchase via `/topup`. They *do not expire* and are only used after your daily free credits have run out.
faq_q8_answer:
Diamonds (ğŸ’) are a special currency in this bot used for premium features, like creating *videos*.

You cannot buy Diamonds directly. The only way to get them is by exchanging your *Credits* (ğŸ’µ).
faq_q9_answer:
You can exchange your Credits (ğŸ’µ) into Diamonds (ğŸ’) using the `/exchange` command.

The exchange rate is:
`20 Credits (ğŸ’µ) = 1 Diamond (ğŸ’)`
